text: The Perth Inferno is an ice hockey team in the Australian Women's Ice Hockey League (AWIHL). They play in Perth, Western Australia, at the Cockburn Ice Arena. Originally founded by Ice Hockey WA in 2016 as the Western Australian (WA) State Women’s Team, they team joined the AWIHL as an expansion team for the 2018–19 and renamed as the Perth Inferno. ==Players== === 2019–20 Roster === In August 2019, the Perth Inferno released the following roster for the 2019–20 AWIHL season. New players to the team included Sydney Fricker (WA Blaze), Heather Hayduk (WA Blaze), Rachel Kogiopoulos, Celeste Milner, Mariam Hall (WA Blaze), Molly Lukowiak and Sara Sammons. Dropped from the roster were Celestine Adams, Keesha Atkins, Taylor Cookson, Katrina Dobo, Melissa Jetten, Ella Licari, Cara Minney-Smith, Shelley Pippo-Giuffre, Courtney Poole, Madison Poole and Tansy Thomas-Bland. {| class="wikitable sortable" |- !# !!
